title: bufferView
description: Represents a view of a buffer for indexing and manipulation

buffer.description: The id (JSON property name) of the buffer referenced by this view.

byteOffset.description: The offset into the buffer, in bytes.

byteLength.description: The length of the buffer view, in bytes.

target.description: Required target type for bindBuffer(), must be ARRAY_BUFFER or ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER
